snippet.title: Mario Kart 64 Remade - Mario Kart Wii Custom Track Distribution Showcase
snippet.description:
Finally after a long wait I'm releasing my Mario Kart Wii Custom Track Distribution [Mario Kart 64 Remade]. Please before using it consider reading the README.txt that is included with the download.

for WBFS users, the game will only boot if the language is set to english.

If you find any issues with this modpack PLEASE write it down below on the comments or talk to me in discord [diegovapy].

Changelog since the last update:
Restored ALL of the Mario Kart 64 Soundtrack (+16 Soundtracks from other games for the retro cup tracks)
Remade item icons
Remade item models (Thanks Josei)
Updated item roulette animation
Remade HUD Sprites from scratch (Special thanks to Funtendo18 for helping me doing some of the sprites)
Added online Wiimmfi support [Region 625]
Remade cup preview videos
Fixed and improved riivolution xml files
Added Mario Kart Wii Deluxe My stuff support as well as CTGP My Stuff Support
Added custom speedometer font
Updated Staff Roll
Rebalanced item probabilities
Updated title screen images
Improved Standard Kart Model (Thanks Josei)
Added a Daisy retexture that resembles it's 64 era look
Updated and replaced most of the custom tracks
- Luigi Raceway [Replaced with Zilly version]
- Koopa troopa beach [Replaced with ZPL version]
- Kalimari Desert [Replaced with Sniki version]
- Toad's Turnpike [Updated]
- Frappe Snowland [Replaced with Altair Yoshi version]
- Choco Choco Mountain [Replaced with TacoJosh version]
- Mario Raceway [Replaced with MysterE99 version]
- Wario Stadium [Replaced with Paratroopa3 version]
- Royal Raceway [Replaced with Paratroopa3 version]
- Yoshi Valley [Replaced with ZPL version v1.4]
- Banshee Boardwalk [Replaced with ZPL version]
- All retro cup tracks were replaced to be more related to the 64 era.
Special thanks to the creators of these amazing tracks also including Tailscraft, Bear, Waltz, Hollend, Squadaloo, Billy and Mewtwo2000.

I really hope you enjoy this modpack as much as I do enjoy it!
Any suggestions in the comments too, as i like to read them ^^
If you liked this video and my mod and want to support me subscribe.

More information and updated riivolution download links are available at the custom Mario Kart Wiiki: https://wiki.tockdom.com/wiki/Mario_Kart_64_Remade
(will be updated later)

And now after that loooong text here's the download link:
Google Drive: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1yfbD61XfBxh5yHAOyVmsa-1nlDQORDxe?usp=sharing
Mediafire: https://www.mediafire.com/folder/qipkmf6xjxt21/Mario_Kart_64_Remade_v3.0
Discord server: https://discord.gg/fF5FDNhckn (other downloads, support and online rooms for the modpack)

If you want to support my mods you can do it through my ko-fi n.n
https://ko-fi.com/diegovapy
